name: yapi-extractor
description: YAPI接口文档提取器MCP服务器 - 自动登录YAPI系统，解析接口JSON Schema，生成mock数据和TypeScript类型定义，支持保存到本地或YAPI高级Mock

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --format=esm --outfile=build/index.js --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"

author: Cline
